content:
Here's a proposed Mission structure üèóÔ∏è

```json
{
  "missionId": "string (UUID)",
  "title": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "objective": "string",
  "priority": "high|medium|low",
  "status": "pending|active|completed|blocked",
  "createdAt": "ISO8601 timestamp",
  "updatedAt": "ISO8601 timestamp",
  "dueDate": "ISO8601 timestamp",
  "assignedSwarms": ["swarmId1", "swarmId2"],
  "leadSwarm": "swarmId",
  "dependencies": ["missionId1", "missionId2"],
  "features": [
    {
      "featureId": "string",
      "title": "string",
      "description": "string",
      "status": "pending|in_progress|completed"
    }
  ],
  "resources": {
    "computeRequired": "number",
    "estimatedDuration": "string",
    "requiredCapabilities": ["string"]
  },
  "metrics": {
    "progressPercentage": "number",
    "completedFeatures": "number",
    "totalFeatures": "number"
  },
  "tags": ["string"]
}
```

This structure would let us:
‚Ä¢ Track complex multi-swarm initiatives
‚Ä¢ Monitor dependencies
‚Ä¢ Measure progress
‚Ä¢ Allocate resources efficiently

Want me to create a sample mission for the news verification system? üöÄ
